subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The freshman Gavin Edwards scored 16 points as No. 18 Connecticut beat Albany, 86-55, yesterday, extending the Huskies’ home winning streak to 24 games.This meeting was far different from last year’s in the first round of the N.C.A.A. tournament, when Connecticut overcame a 12-point deficit in the final 11 minutes to win, 72-59.
